short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat with others without ever exiting your tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Circulus is an extension that allows you to message other users through a chrome extension instead of a website. This allows you to stay focused on whatever you were doing before while still keeping in touch with friends. Simply download the extension, pin it to your browser, and tap the icon to get started.
